I wasn't guilty. Wow!
This game is worth it for the writing and voice acting alone. The puns and comebacks are so witty it makes you want to keep playing just to hear a little more.

This is a fun game, but I beat the game in 2 hours on Normal difficulty. I can go back and start a new game, but I wish there was an option to keep playing on the game I was playing. Not worth $4.99 in my opinion

title.label: It’s a game to enjoy over and over again

content.label:
I bought this game about 5 years ago. I always come back to play it because it so enjoyable. The storyline is well written and very funny. The characterizations hold a lot of humor too.  

For the cost of the app, it’s been a great deal for me for the hours of entertainment I have experienced.

title.label: Great game, but I noticed a SIGNIFICANT problem

content.label: I have been on and off with this game and don’t get me wrong it’s addicting, but I have one issue. The damage points for example “interrogation” is supposed to give damage of 2-3 to witnesses and etc..but instead it would give me a damage effect of 1 on occasions.. that is an issue within my gameplay since that is not what is listed to give for damage. If we can find ways to rectify issues like this my experience would be greatly improved. Also adding some more interesting comedy to dialogue as well.
I love this game. So happy the developers made an X version

I love this game! My biggest issue with it is that the story isn’t very long and I beat the game only a few hours after buying it. I would love a part two or a way to keep doing cases just for fun after you beat it!
This is the best game on the App Store, glad I’m able to play it again!!
Best game on the App Store!

i spent hours playing this game years ago but over time the developers stopped updating it. i’ve been looking for ways to play games that haven’t been updated for a long time but i could never figure it out. the only reason i was looking for that’s was to play this game but they finally updated it for the newer softfware! this is by far the best lawyer/ attorney game i’ve ever played. the voice acting is incredible, the animation is unique and stylish, the game mechanics are pretty realistic, and it has a plethora of content for you to explore. if you have an interest in strategy games or law then i highly recommend playing this game!

Please update to the latest iOS!!  I love this game but it’s not supported anymore!

Update- super excited that they updated! Love this game!!!
Awesome funny entertaining game, bought because of the new update that brings enhancements in graphics and phone support. Highly recommended !!
This game is one that I would certainly buy again. It offered plenty of entertainment while still requiring me to use my brain. My only beef is that there isn’t more! How about a season 2?

I spent hours on this game!  The case stories don’t change with difficulty level, only the strategy.  

How do we earn all the awards?  Once you solve all the cases, we can’t purchase any more upgrades and therefore don’t collect any more items, when clearly there are over 20 slots to collect them.  The most I’ve been offered are 3. 

So I’m bored now.  It was a great $4.99 spent for Sunday evening entertainment!  But now it’s Tuesday and I’ve played the Normal and Easy mode, onto the Hard mode but I’ve lost interest bc I can see that the story and upgrades are the same and no matter what I won’t get all of the items.
The game is great. But, it’s been out for like 6 years, you think the developer would add some additional by now.
I loved this game and was bummed it never got an update / was ever updated to work on newer devices. SO HAPPY it was updated and now new people can enjoy it! Time to revisit this gem!

title.label: Finally able to revisit this gem.

content.label: Kudos for the update. Still a great game even though it’s over 6 years old at this point. Here’s hoping Apple features this some day to let people who loved it know it’s playable again and people who never heard of it back in the day to give it the love it deserves now

title.label: Finally the update is here. Super Awesome Game

content.label: Never thought I’d love a game like this. My wife and I both are crazy about it. I even got my daughters playing. We’re all sprung. You’ll spend hours playing and will easily bypass food and grown up time stuck on this here game.
